stimulusHtml: If a typical firm in a perfectly competitive market earns positive economic profit in the short run, what will most likely happen in the long run?
choicesHtml: Firms will enter the market and cause the price to fall.
Firms will enter the market and cause the price to rise.
Firms will exit the market and cause the price to fall.
Firms will exit the market and the cause price to rise.
There will be no change in the market because profit is maximized.
